first.text: Welcome to HelpDesk! do you want any help
ok, If you want to fix a new appointement say 1, if you want to check the statut of you appointement say 2!

repeat.text: 1 for new appointement. 2 for check the statut ?!

when_callback.text: ok bye, if you need any help you can call me any time, have a nice day!

first.text: ok can you please tell us your full name?

repeat.text: I was saying. you full name please?

first.text: Thank you, can you tell us your full name?

repeat.text: I was saying. we need you full name, and your contact number?

first.text: So sorry this appointement has been resheduled!

repeat.text: I was saying, we are really sorry but your appointement has been resheduled
I was saying. what is the name of the docotor that you need ?

first.text: sorry, this docotor is not avalaible in this time!

repeat.text: I was saying. how can we help you since your docotr is not avlaible?

first.text: Thank you. Can you please tell us when you want to visit dr.smith ?
Thank you so much. your appointement has been sheduled , see you in time. Anything else we should make note of?

repeat.text: I was saying. Anything else we should make note of?

first.text: Thank you so much for your time, Bye!

repeat.text: I was saying. Anything else we should make note of?

random.text: Sorry, could you say it again?
Sorry, the connection dropped for a second. Could you say that again?
Sorry, I didn't quite catch that.
Could you say it one more time?

dont_understand_hangup.text: I'm sorry I can barely hear you. I'll try to call you later! Bye!

dont_understand_forward.text: I'm sorry, let me transfer you to another agent. Please stand by!

yes_i_am_a_robot.text: Actually I am an advanced AI. Just don't tell my boss or I'll be out of a job.
